Literature Review: Single-cell multiomics has revolutionized our understanding of complex biological systems by enabling the analysis of heterogeneity and transcriptomic states at the single-cell level. The integration of multiple modalities, including genomic, epigenomic, proteomic, and spatial data, has opened up new avenues for understanding cellular biology and its interactions. This review aims to discuss the recent advancements in single-cell technologies and computational integration methods for combining multimodal data, highlighting the potential of single-cell multiomics for gaining deeper insights into biological systems.
